message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn. How about a slightly better split for me this time?
I'll give you a bit more, but I still want the bigger share
This is a fair deal, Alice. Let's close it out.
You're losing value, I'm being generous
Alice, let's be real - this back and forth is pointless.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly. Take it before inflation hurts us both.
Your 50/50 was close, but I still want a bit more
Alice, this is getting absurd. I'm offering you a slight advantage, but this needs to end now. Accept this offer or I walk.
You're bluffing, I know you won't walk
